sect1.title: Hydrogen supply
sect1.para: Where delivery method permits, your H2MDK will be supplied with pre-filled HydroSTIK. To refill your HydroSTIK we recommend that you purchase a Horizon Fuel Cell HydroFILL home electrolyser which generates hydrogen from electricity and distilled water. HydroFILL can run on mains electricity or on DC. For more information see the Horizon fuel cell website.
